author: mmusich
body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41783

#### PR description:

Trivial bug-fix in the labeling of plots vs Online Luminosity. The x-axis should have units of  $10^{30} Hz/cm^{2}$ and not   $10^{31} Hz/cm^{2}$.

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles, no regressions expected

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Verbatim intermediate backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41783 for 2023 data-taking purposes.
title: [13.1.X] `TrackingMonitor`: fix x-axis label in plots vs online luminosity
